titles.title: Commemorating the 200th anniversary of the birth of Vermont Senator Justin Smith Morrill, who helped create a national system of land-grant colleges.
Commemorating the 200th anniversary of the birth of Vermont Senator Justin Smith Morrill, who helped create a national system of land-grant colleges.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Commemorates the 200th anniversary of the birth of Justin Smith Morrill.
